title: Bedcover, late 19th century
creditline: Gift of W. and J. Sloane
description: Design of large scale flowers and birds on a trellis of gnarled branches in shades of deep purple and yellow on white ground. Reverse side has large scale pattern of  flowers in red on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, late 19th century.
late 19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed. Gift of W. and J. Sloane. 1943-43-41.
